group_1.textLeft: Could you be one too?!

group_1.textRight: Yes!
My name is Kako Natsume!

group_1.textLeft: A Magical Girl from Kamihama City...!@I happened to come here from Asunaro.

group_1.textRight: Wow! It's my first time meeting a Magical Girl from@Asunaro City.
There's so many fun places in Asunaro, aren't there?
Like Lavieland, and the Angelica Bears Museum...
Oh, and the cafe Lepa Macha!@Their food is delicious!
We saw it on TV a little while ago, and my mother@said the chef was very handsome.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I agree that Mr. Tachibana is a wonderful chef...@but...

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, I'm so sorry!@There I go, talking your ear off...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's justâ€”@shall we transform back?

group_1.textRight: Oh! Right, good point.
I was so excited to meet an Asunaro Magical Girl@for the first time...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* We may live in different cities, but we're all@Magical Girls just the same.

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, that's right.

group_1.textLeft: I came here with two fellow Magical Girls while@chasing a Witch.
But it seems we got split up while inside the Witch's@Labyrinth...
Their names are Kazumi and Kaoru. Have you@heard those names at all recently?

group_1.textRight: Kazumi and Kaoru... no, I think this is the first@I've heard of them.
I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: There's no need for you to apologize.
But if you or any of your friends happen to hear@about them in the future...
I'd really appreciate it if you could contact me@with your information.

group_1.textRight: Contact you...? How?

group_1.textLeft: You can just signal me via your Gem. That'll do fine.

group_1.textRight: Oh, yes!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'll be off.

group_1.textRight: I'd like to assist you!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: You might have trouble searching on your own@in such an unfamiliar place...
Plus, I think it's kind of like fate that@two Magical Girls met like this!

group_1.textLeft: (She's right. But I can't assume that all Magical Girls@are on our side...)
(...No, I can tell from her eyes. They're just as clear@as Kazumi's...)
Thank you, Kako.@I think I'll take you up on that offer.

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textLeft: So, would you mind if I asked some questions about@this city while we search?

group_1.textRight: Oh, not at all... but...

group_1.textLeft: Do you have something to take care of@right now, too?

group_1.textRight: No, not in particular...

group_1.textLeft: I apologize for saying this when you're the one doing@me a favor, but we don't have much time to waste.

group_1.textRight: Um... I mean...
My house is actually nearby, so maybe you'd like@to stop by for tea...?

group_1.textLeft: We REALLY don't have much time.

group_1.textRight: Um, but Kamihama is very big... and I think it'd be@good to spend time planning before we head out...!
I-I'm very sorry... if you're in a hurry, though,@we can talk while walking...

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right. We should take time to focus@and plan our next move.

group_1.textRight: Ah, all right! I'll lead the way, then.@It's just up ahead...

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.
